name: Pixel Derby (Dabby Media)
description:
PIXEL DERBY is a retro-styled horse racing simulator.
Need to settle a bet? Gather your friends, pick your favorite horse, put some money down (if you want) and let the race begin!

CREDITS
Graphics by FinalBossBlues
Music by Ocean
Sound Effects by Dabby Media
Developed by Dabby Media with Clickteam Fusion 2.5
